channel.title: Changing text on quest tap
channel.description: I cant seem to change the text in my quest tap. Im using Downscape v2. I looked in all player.java files and could not find the right file. Can anyone help me out please. If images need say so. I have made a mistake its not quest tap. I really don't now what to call it but is like a second quest tap.

item.title: Changing text on quest tap
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Jean Valjean:

I cant seem to change the text in my quest tap. Im using Downscape v2. I looked in all player.java files and could not find the right file. Can anyone help me out please. If images need say so.

There should be a “sendInterfaceString” method in either your client, or your packet manager. All you need to do is find out the id of the string you want to change, then send that id to the method like so;

sendInterfaceString(stringId, "Your string here");

Read full topic
